product_name: Mountain Hardwear Mountain Tech Vest - Men's
long_description: Cool-weather, backcountry adventures are the perfect setting for a windproof fleece vest. The Mountain Hardwear Mountain Tech vest keeps your core warm while you're active. AirShield(TM) Core is a durable, windproof membrane that allows heat and moisture to vapor escape, so you stay dry from the inside. Soft-shell panels on the shoulders and upper back add durability and weather resistance. Micro-Chamois(TM)-lined chin guard prevents zipper chafe. Dual hem drawcords provides quick fit adjustments. Mountain Hardwear Mountain Tech vest has 2 zippered handwarmer pockets.
short_description: Cool-weather, backcountry adventures are the perfect setting for a windproof fleece vest. The Mountain Hardwear Mountain Tech vest keeps your core warm while you're active.
